            - Preceding Text: "# Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast

Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast is a secret Yaoguai King boss hidden in Chapter 5 of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. You can find this ferocious beast at the end of the hidden area, with its two types of elemental attacks making it a difficult fight.


Head right from the Keeper's Shrine and go down the stairs. A cutscene will play as you drop down, and the Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast will appear.

## Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast Boss Fight and Guide

It will sometimes roll over when it tries to punch you and misses, allowing you to perform a quick follow-up attack. Where it differs from the other bosses, is that it will also leap up in the air and land like a frog, creating an explosion around it each time it lands. This move can be quite erratic, but you can avoid it entirely by keeping your distance."
            - Following Text: "One move to watch out for that has a wider area of attack is when it scraps its fist along the floor and flings an arc of fire toward you. These will stay on the ground for a while, and the beast can create multiple of them at once. This is when you'll want to have the Body-Cooling Powder and Fireproof Mantle on hand, as it becomes harder to dodge these the more they build up.

Besides this, it will also charge at you leaving a trail of fire behind it. When it's charging, it's best to dodge the attacks and aim to build up Focus. The heavier you can attack, the better, because you'll want to stun the beast as often as possible."

Preceding Text Summary:  
The Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast is a secret boss in *Black Myth: Wukong*, located in a hidden area of Chapter 5. It uses two types of elemental attacks, making it a challenging opponent. The fight begins after a cutscene, and the beast employs erratic moves such as rolling over and leaping into the air to create explosive shockwaves.

Image Summary:  
The image depicts the Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast in the middle of its fiery attacks during the boss fight. The ground is covered with flames and fire trails, showcasing the beast's elemental abilities. A statue in the background adds to the ominous atmosphere, while the player character is seen preparing to engage the boss.

Following Text Summary:  
The Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast uses a wide-area attack by scraping its fist along the ground to fling arcs of fire, which linger and accumulate. It also charges at the player, leaving fire trails behind. Players are advised to use Body-Cooling Powder and Fireproof Mantle to mitigate damage and focus on stunning the beast with heavy attacks.
